Conditional marginal means plot

Source: R/plot_cmm.R
plot_cmm.Rd

This function plots the marginal mean of the outcome variable (y-axis) against values of one or more predictors.

plot_cmm(model, condition, conf.int = TRUE, conf.level = 0.95, draw = TRUE)

Arguments

model

Model object
condition

Name of the variable to plot on the x-axis
conf.int

Logical indicating whether or not to include a confidence interval.
conf.level

The confidence level to use for the confidence interval if conf.int=TRUE. Must be strictly greater than 0 and less than 1. Defaults to 0.95, which corresponds to a 95 percent confidence interval.
draw

TRUE returns a ggplot2 plot. FALSE returns a data.frame of the underlying data.

Value

A ggplot2 object
